title: Recruiting Ranked 5 Team members for Serious Play
body:
Hey guys,

I have decided on starting up my own ranked team, as I have had many previous experiences with ranked teams and want to start getting serious in the ranked 5's side of the game. I am 17 years of age and am currently scraping the borders of Gold and have been in approximately 4, ranked 5 teams. I have great knowledge in the area of teams and working together to achieve the goal of victory. As I am taking this seriously, I will be having schedules in which games are going to be played, practice sessions, and general team meetings which will be occurring every week when possible. I will be wanting the members of the team to be able to play at least 10 games per week. So the team will be consisting of high silver to high gold (Silver 2- Gold 1)

To show that you are interested and would be willing and dedicated to join the team, I'd happily ask if you'd fill out a short application and I will get back to you as quickly as possible.

IGN:
Age:
Main Role:
Favourite Champion:
Rank:
Curse or Skype:
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day:
What hours suit you best to play:
A bit about yourself and league experience:

Once I have accepted your application, I will notify you from in game and go from there!

Thanks, Sir Jazza

replies.body:
**IGN**: Skillz that kill

**Age**: 21 

**Main Role**: Generally fill, adc i guess (and riven xD)

**Favourite Champion**: Riven

**Rank**: Plat 4 currently plat 1 last season placed in silver 2 had to climb thanks riot

**Curse or Skype**: Both, or TS 

**Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day**: Im a Uni student so based around that schedule 2-6hrs a day

**What hours suit you best to play**: night time, wednesday is busy.

**A bit about yourself and league experience**: I played dota 1 before league tried league in season 1 didnt like it came back to it in season 3 played since. ALOT. Have a good group of mates that play league 1 of a similar skill level to me that would also be interested in joining the team. Me and him have wanted to get serious about ranked 5's for a while now and are just looking for a team to do it with.

IGN: SmurfCommando 
Age: 17
Main role: top/jg
Favourite Champion: Darius, Lee sin
Skype: I will make a new one cause I forgot my password xD
Rank: silver
Length dedicated: full dedication 
Time I can play: weekdays 5pm-10pm weekends all day and night
About me: I'm really into league it's my first season im really into e-sports and favourite league e-sport team- TSM : ) I really want to join a ranked team I want to have fun but also be serious in addition to that I don't want to have people rage or troll and feed if something goes wrong

**IGN:** Vapid
**Age:** 28
**Main Role:** Mid/Adc
**Favourite Champion:** Orianna/Vayne
**Rank:** Unranked (waiting for school holidays to be over), Plat 3 last season, finished gold due to inactivity, gold 3 on smurf, gold the previous.
**Curse or Skype:** Curse voice "Vapid"
**Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day:** Flexible
**What hours suit you best to play:** Flexible
**A bit about yourself and league experience:** I've been playing since season 2, I'm an avid fan of the E-sports scene, I'm constantly researching strategies, builds and team comps that work. I'm looking for a team that know their sh*t, mature and can communicate and execute strategies instead of maintaining the yolo-queue mentality.

IGN: Kitty Katt
Age: 20
Main Role: Mid/support
Favourite Champion: Kat/Thresh {{champion:55}} {{champion:412}} 
Rank: S2, HIGH ELO
Curse or Skype: CrabLord
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: as much as you need.
What hours suit you best to play: Any
A bit about yourself and league experience:  Been playing league for about 4 years now, i am getting sick of solo que and people that don't listen when they should so it's about time to look for a team and i hope i can be a part of this one :D
Hey man, jump on league!
Still waiting for add add on either cruse or league.
Will be on league all day today.
would love to join if I wasn't bronze.

Name: Matt

Age: 21

Skype: nightfight94

Elo: Plat 4 currently however usually fluc from 2-4

IGN: NightFight

Lane: Adc or Middle

Secondary Roles: Fill as top

Additional Comments (Optional): Played in several 5's teams all became inactive so looking for one that is more active. I am a uni student while working full time so my time is limited to afternoons and nights. Will give more details about schedule if you're interested in having me.

**IGN:** CIAÔ
**Age:** 21
**Main Role:** Support, Jungle, Top, Mid, ADC (best to worst)
**Favourite Champion:** Leona / Warwick
**Rank: **Silver 1 has been to gold and played with challenger people
**Curse or Skype:** v.pollifrone
**Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: **avaliable 11am - till late (wednesday and thursdays im unavailable from 6:00-10:30)
**What hours suit you best to play:**  Whenever
**A bit about yourself and league experience:** Been playing for 4 years now, all my friends are in diamond - challenger. ive done many tournaments and know alot about the game, my current rank team has been disband and we are no longer a team. i can play all roles i prefer to be a tank though.

Once I have accepted your application, I will notify you from in game and go from there!

IGN:  Street
Age: 20
Main Role: Jungle, Mid, Top
Favourite Champion: Zed, Rengar
Rank: Currently gold 1. Was plat 5 but demoted from inactivity 
Curse or Skype: Skype
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: not many per day. Full time uni student. Can play for a few hours 2 nights a week and on the weekend can dedicated a night
What hours suit you best to play: See above
A bit about yourself and league experience: Strong shot caller, have lead many teams previously. Here is a link to my post 


http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/smxWnEHv-gold-1-junglertopmid-lft
Jump on league brother.
Still patching :L

**IGN:** Waifu Ahri
**Age:** 23
**Main Role:** Mid
**Favourite Champion:** Yasuo
**Rank:** Silver 5
**Curse or Skype:** both
**Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day:** 4-5 hours depending on work and family
**What hours suit you best to play:** Mon/Tues: all day (9-5), Wed-Fri: 3/4-6pm then 8-11pm, 
**A bit about yourself and league experience:** Started playing halfway through S3, played serious in S4 and got as high as S3, really want to get better mechanically, and in general gameplay. work really well in a team environment

IGN: HaiiDZ
Age: 25
Main Role: Support
Favourite Champion: Thresh
Rank: S2
Curse or Skype: Both
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: 4hrs weekdays after 4. Most the time on weekends
What hours suit you best to play: after 4 weekdays
A bit about yourself and league experience: Was g3 last season havent been playing much this season currently s2 wanting to get back into it

IGN: TheDecomposer
Age:19
Main role: top

Favourite Champion: Nasus
Rank: Silver V 
Curse or Skype: either
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: As many as it takes. I'm currently on hiatus from work, so I have effectively unlimited time to practice.
What hours suit you best to play: As above, as long as I'm not sleeping, I'm available to play.
A bit about yourself and league experience: I was a gold I when I played on NA, but never played much ranked upon transferring to OCE. I've been playing since preseason 1, and I'm looking to climb back up to at least that, if not further, now that I have the free time.

IGN: Ploxp
Age: 16 (17 this year)
Main Role: jungle
Favourite Champion: Shaco {{champion:35}} 
Rank: Silver 1 
Curse or Skype: Skype
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: depends on what I have during the day, most likely 1 hour during school days and at least 5 hours during holidays/breaks from school
What hours suit you best to play: afternoons
A bit about yourself and league experience: I am an ex plat. I am flexible with champions and have a great (by my understand) knowledge of the game. I went from 500 elo to 1800-1900 elo so I would say I have made a lot of progress since i first playing the game.

IGN: Order
Age: 20
Main Role: mid/adc
Favourite Champion: ori ryze tf zed ziggs ahri vayne eareal cait corki
Curse or Skype: both or razercomms
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: i can suit anytime
What hours suit you best to play: less then 12hours i need sleep i guess
A bit about yourself and league experience: I look for 'serious' team

**IGN:** PvPRealm
**Age:** 16
**Main Role:** ADC
**Favourite Champion:** Vayne {{champion:67}}  
**Rank: **S4 (but can easily climb if I tried - I just dont take SoloQ that seriously)
**Curse or Skype:** I prefer using Skype over Curse but can easily use Curse:/
**Length of time dedicate to the team p/day:** Really anytime is fine, Im on all weekend and after school hours on weekdays
**Bio:** Ive been playing since the end of Season 3 basically, but only started seriously playing on my main account at the start of Season 4. I am willing to take a ranked 5's team seriously as I've been looking for the same thing :)

You guys should enter in the OCE LOL Cup.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/ZWxTI0zZ-oceanic-lol-cup-500-rp-first-prize-registration-open-now

IGN: Adjacent World
Age: 19
Main Role: Top
Favourite Champion: Shyvanna
Rank: Gold 5
Curse or Skype: Both
Length of time: As much as required really not as much during weekdays but weekends I'm game.
What Hours suit best to play: Any really just depends on the day.
Basic Knowhow about myself: Been playing since season 2, First rank was bronze 5 (I only started ranked once there was an OCE server) but made the difficult but self fulfilling climb to Gold 4.
